Domates Çorbası.recipe: Cook onion and garlic in olive oil. Add chopped tomatoes and water/stock, simmer 15–20 min. Blend, season with salt. Serve hot.

Etli Nohut.recipe: Soak chickpeas overnight. Sauté onion, add beef cubes, brown. Add tomato paste, chickpeas, water, salt and spices. Simmer until tender.

Pirinç Pilavı.recipe: Rinse rice. Sauté in butter, add water/stock and salt. Cover and cook on low until water absorbed. Rest 10 min and fluff.

Mercimek Çorbası.recipe: Sauté onion/carrot in oil. Add rinsed lentils and water/stock. Simmer 20–25 min and blend. Season and serve.

Balık Hamsi.recipe: Clean anchovies, salt lightly. Coat with flour, fry in hot oil until crisp. Drain and serve.

Fıstıklı Alman Patates.recipe: Boil potatoes, slice. Mix dressing (oil + vinegar/lemon + salt/pepper). Toss with onion and potatoes, top with crushed pistachio and parsley.

Salata Açık Büfe.recipe: Choose fresh vegetables, add a light dressing if desired.

Makarna.recipe: Boil pasta in salted water. Drain and toss with a little oil/butter.

Tazefasulye.recipe: Sauté onion in olive oil. Add beans and tomatoes, salt, a splash of water. Simmer until tender.

Kemalpaşa.recipe: Boil sugar-water syrup with lemon. Add kemalpaşa pieces, simmer until syrup absorbed. Serve warm, optionally with cream.

Yoğurt Çorbası.recipe: Whisk yogurt, flour, egg. Slowly temper with warm stock, then cook gently while stirring. Finish with butter-mint sauce.

Tavuk Şiş.recipe: Marinate chicken with yogurt, spices, oil and onion/garlic. Skewer and grill/pan-sear until cooked through.

Bulgur Pilavı.recipe: Sauté bulgur with oil and tomato paste. Add water/stock and salt. Cook covered until tender and fluffy.

ingredients: Option A: onion rings (onion, flour, oil)
Soğan Halkası/Lahana Kavurma.recipe: Onion rings: slice onion, coat with flour/batter and fry. Cabbage: sauté shredded cabbage with oil and salt until soft.

Sütlaç.recipe: Cook rice with water until soft. Add milk and sugar, simmer until creamy. Chill and serve with cinnamon.

Tel Şehriye Çorbası.recipe: Sauté vermicelli in butter/oil until lightly golden. Add stock/water (and tomato paste if used), simmer 10 min. Season.

İzmir Köfte.recipe: Mix meatball ingredients, form köfte. Arrange with potato slices, cover with tomato sauce, bake until cooked through.

Soslu Patlıcan.recipe: Roast or pan-fry eggplant slices. Simmer with tomato-garlic sauce and olive oil for 10–15 min.

Beyran Çorbası.recipe: Cook meat in stock until tender. Add rice and simmer. Finish with garlic-chili butter/oil. Serve hot.

Tavuk Kanat.recipe: Season wings, bake or grill until crisp and cooked through.

Domates Soslu Makarna.recipe: Cook pasta. Sauté garlic in olive oil, add tomato sauce and simmer 8–10 min. Toss with pasta.

Kereviz.recipe: Sauté vegetables in olive oil, add water and lemon. Simmer until tender. Serve warm or chilled.

Profiterol.recipe: Fill choux puffs with pastry cream, top with chocolate sauce.
